pkgmetadata.longdescription: Bayesian Optimal Block Designs // Computes Bayesian A- and D-optimal block designs under the linear mixed effects model settings using block/array exchange algorithm of Debusho, Gemechu and Haines (2018) doi:10.1080/03610918.2018.1429617 and Gemechu, Debusho and Haines (2025) doi:10.5539/ijsp.v14n1p50 where the interest is in a comparison of all possible elementary treatment contrasts. The package also provides an optional method of using the graphical user interface (GUI) R package 'tcltk' to ensure that it is user friendly.
